fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player. You will attack them, but then they will also magically be converted into whichever faction you're a part of.
- At night, choose a dead player to revive.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only revive a single player.
- Your conversions must comply with any member limit that your faction has.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win with whichever faction you're a member of.
